title: Definitions
context: E. Special Benefits for Members in Military Service §88-131 Definitions. As used in sections 88-131 to 88-142: &ldquo;Service in the armed forces&rdquo;: active service (1) in military service, as defined in section 88-132, or (2) in any other essential war service covered by the Servicemen&rsquo;s Act. &ldquo;Service member&rdquo;: a member of the system who is entitled to the benefits provided by the Servicemen&rsquo;s Act. &ldquo;Servicemen&rsquo;s Act&rdquo;: includes section 88-132 and any other act extending benefits similar to those of the section to other classes of persons in essential war services. [L 1951, c 262, pt of §3; RL 1955, §6-110; HRS §88-121; am L 1969, c 110, pt of §1] Revision Note Definitions rearranged.
